{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Nungata |image = Portrait Nungata convo.png |image2 = PE2 Nungata.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 1 |MIG = 10 |CON = 10 |DEX = 10 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 1 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 0 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 0 |fortitude = 4 |reflex = 0 |will = 0 |dr = 3 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/) |location = [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/), outside the palace, to the northwest. |quests = [Bounty - Beina](/bountyBeina/)
[Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali](/bountyFlamewalkerVessali/)
[Bounty - The Steel Preacher](/bountyTheSteelPreacher/)
[Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender](/bountyUamoruThePretender/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Mataru Clothing |internalname = NPC_PD_Nungata |guid = 8c08df69-cdc9-4ead-8146-be4389226f21 }} '''Nungata''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|A woman with skin like hardened sailcloth sits upright and stares off to the distance, her lips held in a tight and thoughtful pinch. She blinks and sits even straighter as you cross her view.}} Nungata is an elderly lady who retired to Neketaka after a lifetime of adventuring, violence, and great achievement. However, her life as a bounty hunter that followed the hunting of equally slippery creatures in the jungle has led to a great many foes in her life. She retired, but even a retired Mataru works for the betterment of the tribe. As such, she processes [Huana](/huana/) [bounties](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/). She's worked with [Tekēhu](/tekehu/) in the past - and remembers him well, for the godlike plundered half of her earnings after they took down a crab thief (though Tekēhu insists it was only a third). ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = * [Bounty - Beina](/bountyBeina/) * [Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali](/bountyFlamewalkerVessali/) * [Bounty - The Steel Preacher](/bountyTheSteelPreacher/) * [Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender](/bountyUamoruThePretender/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = * She has unique dialogue with [Tekēhu](/tekehu/). * If you've completed the bounties for [Abocco](/abocco/), she will mention this, though rather patronizingly. }} ## =Quests = * Nungata hands out bounties. [Category:Serpent's Crown characters](/categorySerpentsCrownCharacters/)

[[Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Mataru Clothing |internalname = NPC_PD_Nungata |guid = 8c08df69-cdc9-4ead-8146-be4389226f21 }} '''Nungata''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|A woman with skin like hardened sailcloth sits upright and stares off to the distance, her lips held in a tight and thoughtful pinch. She blinks and sits even straighter as you cross her view.}} Nungata is an elderly lady who retired to Neketaka after a lifetime of adventuring, violence, and great achievement. However, her life as a bounty hunter that followed the hunting of equally slippery creatures in the jungle has led to a great many foes in her life. She retired, but even a retired Mataru works for the betterment of the tribe. As such, she processes [[Huana]] [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire quests#Bounties|bounties]]. She's worked with [[Tekēhu]] in the past - and remembers him well, for the godlike plundered half of her earnings after they took down a crab thief (though Tekēhu insists it was only a third). ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = * [[Bounty - Beina]] * [[Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali]] * [[Bounty - The Steel Preacher]] * [[Bounty - Uamoru the Pretender]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = * She has unique dialogue with [[Tekēhu]]. * If you've completed the bounties for [[Abocco]], she will mention this, though rather patronizingly. }} ===Quests=== * Nungata hands out bounties. title: Nungata
